name: Beartic
description: It can make its breath freeze at will. Very able in the water, it swims around in northern seas and catches prey.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.effect: During hail, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in snow.

abilities.name: Slush Rush
abilities.effect: During Hail, this Pokémon has double Speed.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in rain.
